title: The Unseen Guardian: The Story of Sue Jenkins
summary: Over one week, Sue Jenkins, a 44-year-old coach and counselor discovers her ability to influence emotions and uses it to avert a crisis in her community.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche hinweg entdeckt Sue Jenkins, eine 44-jährige Trainerin und Beraterin, ihre Fähigkeit, Emotionen zu beeinflussen und verwendet diese, um eine Krise in ihrer Gemeinde zu verhindern.
summaryDutch: Gedurende één week ontdekt Sue Jenkins, een 44-jarige coach en counselor, haar vermogen om emoties te beïnvloeden en gebruikt dit om een crisis in haar gemeenschap te voorkomen.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, Sue Jenkins, une coach et conseillère de 44 ans, découvre sa capacité à influencer les émotions et l'utilise pour éviter une crise dans sa communauté.

story.text: As a beloved coach, Sue Jenkins started her week feeling energetic, heartened by her team's enthusiasm at practice.
Sue sensed a palpable sense of sadness among her students; using her burgeoning powers, she counseled them, subtly lifting their spirits.
Midweek, Sue grew more confident in her abilities. She used her newfound powers to diffuse a potentially explosive argument among community members, feeling triumphant.
That night, Sue felt eerie; she realized her powers were growing stronger, now able to reach people even in their dreams, guiding them towards peace.
On Friday, rumors of her deeds had begun to spread, igniting a romantic legend in the community about a guardian angel, which made Sue both honored and uncomfortable.
Over the weekend, Sue attended a town meeting. She preemptively eased tensions, paving the way for peaceful, productive discussions.
Reflecting on her week, Sue felt happy and fulfilled, realizing she had positively altered her community's dynamics without them ever knowing it was her.

ending: And from that week on, Sue Jenkins continued to quietly watch over her community, forever their unseen guardian.
moral: Great power does not need recognition to effect great change.
